name: WRONGED
description:
It Is In Your House Now.
WRONGED is the new horror-adventure-puzzle game from solo developer Joshua Roland. Trapped in a warped, claustrophobic nightmare, the player must use only household items and their own wits to overcome the oppressive darkness around them, and the horrors that lurk within.

Combining classic item-based adventure-puzzle gameplay with a low-poly, pixellated art style, WRONGED is an unsettling experience with a heavy focus on disturbing visuals and harrowing, psychological horror.

WRONGED features multiple pathways for multiple endings. Only the strongest will survive.
